dublin_core.dcvalue: Response rates to postal questionnaires are falling and this threatens the external validity of survey findings We wanted to establish whether the incentive of being entered into a prize draw to win a personal digital assistant PDA would increase the response rate for a national survey of consultant obstetricians and gynaecologists
Effect of prize draw incentive on the response rate to a postal survey of obstetricians and gynaecologists: a randomised controlled trial. [ISRCTN32823119].
